name.jp: リトル・スチールナイト

description.en: A cute and fast, baby, Steel Knight that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.ar: A cute and fast, baby, Steel Knight that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.br: Um fofo e rápido, bebê, Cavaleiro de Aço que segue seu mestre e coleta itens caídos.
description.cns: 捡宠，召唤时会自动拾取周围道具。
description.de: Ein niedliches und schnelles Baby Steel Knight, das seinem Herrn folgt und heruntergefallene Gegenstände aufhebt
description.fi: A cute and fast, baby, Steel Knight that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.fil: A cute and fast, baby, Steel Knight that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.fr: Un bébé Steelknight mignon et rapide qui suit son maître et ramasse les objets tombés au sol
description.id: Bayi yang lucu dan cepat, bayi, Steel Knight yang mengikuti tuannya berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang yang dijatuhkan
description.it: A cute and fast, baby, Steel Knight that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.jp: 主人の後をついて回り、アイテムを拾ってくれます。かわいくて素早いリトル・スチールナイト
description.kr: 귀엽고 빠른 새끼 스틸나이트는 주인을 따라다니며 드롭된 아이템을 줍습니다
description.nl: A cute and fast, baby, Steel Knight that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.pl: A cute and fast, baby, Steel Knight that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.ru: A cute and fast, baby, Steel Knight that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.sp: Un lindo y rápido Steel Knight Bebé que sigue a su dueño y recoge los objetos soltados.
description.sw: A cute and fast, baby, Steel Knight that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.th: Baby Steel Knight เด็กน้อยผู้น่ารักและว่องไวที่ตามเจ้านายของมันไปรอบๆ และหยิบของที่หล่นลงมา
description.tw: 一個可愛且速度快的騎士機械寶貝，它跟隨它的主人到處走並撿起掉落的道具。
description.vi: Một đứa bé dễ thương và nhanh nhẹn, Hiệp sĩ thép đi theo chủ nhân của nó và nhặt những món đồ bị đánh rơi
